doctor.name: Dr. Md. Monirul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Monirul Islam is a Chest Specialist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, DTCD (Dhaka), DTCE (Japan), FCCP (USA), MRIT (Japan). He is a Senior Consultant (Ex), Respiratory Medicine at Chest Disease Hospital, Sylhet. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Hospital, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Monirul Islam at Ibn Sina Hospital, Sylhet is Morning (Closed: Friday).

doctor.info: Dr. Bijoy Pada Gope is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Respiratory Medicine).
